shortcv.p: Konstantinos Stroggylos is a PhD Candidate at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB), Department of Management Science and Technology. He holds a BSc in Informatics and a MSc in Information Systems, both from Athens University of Economics and Business.

In the past he has worked in IT support&consulting and software development positions during his studies. He is a member of the SENSE group. His research interests include programming languages and Software Engineering (specifically software refactoring, testing and Design Patterns).
